import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../css/main-page.css"; import exit from "../images/exit.svg"; import vector from "../images/vector.svg" import fullDate from "../js/date"; import fullDatePunkt from "../js/date"; import Location from "../components/Location_Input"; import Hotel_Item from "../components/Favourite_item"; import Unfavourite_item from "../components/Unfavourite_item"; const Main = () => { const today = new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 10); function padTo2Digits(num) { return num.toString().padStart(2, '0'); } function formatDate(date) { return [ padTo2Digits(date.getDate()), padTo2Digits(date.getMonth() + 1), date.getFullYear(), ].join('.'); } console.log(document.getElementsByClassName("test")[0]) const innerOfLoc = document.querySelector(".simple-value") const locationDefault = document.querySelector(".react-selectize-placeholder") const [type, setType] = useState('text') const focusDate = () => { setType(type => type = "date") } const [city, setCity] = useState("Москва") const onChange = (e) => { }; const onSubmitEvent = (e) => { setCity( city => city ); e.preventDefault(); console.log(city) }; function openChange(value) { return console.log(JSON.stringify(value, ["label"]).toString().slice(10, -2)) } return (
